text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Error Rates>
We are investigating increased error rates for Kinesis Data Streams APIs in the AP-EAST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Faults and Latencies>
We are investigating increased faults and latencies for CloudWatch Metrics PutMetricData and CloudWatch Logs PutLogEvents APIs in the AP-EAST-1 Region. CloudWatch alarms may transition into "INSUFFICIENT_DATA" state if set on delayed metrics.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Error Rates>
We are investigating increased error rates for Kinesis Data Firehose APIs in the AP-EAST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Error Rates>
We can confirm Kinesis Data Streams is experiencing increased error rates on all APIs in the AP-EAST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Error Rates>
We are investigating increased error rates for Kinesis Data Firehose APIs in the AP-EAST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Error Rates>
We can confirm Kinesis Data Firehose is experiencing increased error rates on all APIs in the AP-EAST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Faults and Latencies>
We can confirm increased faults and latencies for CloudWatch Metrics PutMetricData and CloudWatch Logs PutLogEvents APIs in the AP-EAST-1 Region, we are actively working to resolve the issue.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Faults and Latencies>
We can confirm recovery for the CloudWatch Logs PutLogEvents API and continue to work towards recovery for the Metrics PutMetricsData API in the AP-EAST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased Error Rates>
Between 9:19 AM and 10:52 AM PST Kinesis Data Streams customers experienced increased error rates on all APIs in the AP-EAST-1 Region. The issue is resolved and the service is operating normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased Faults and Latencies>
Between 09:15 AM and 10:51 AM PST, some customers experienced elevated faults when calling CloudWatch Metrics PutMetricData and CloudWatch Logs PutLogEvents APIs in the AP-EAST-1 Region. Some metrics were delayed, CloudWatch alarms on delayed metrics transitioned into INSUFFICIENT_DATA state, and some metric data may be missing. The issue is resolved and the service is operating normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased Error Rates>
Between 9:19 AM and 10:52 AM PST Kinesis Data Firehose customers experienced increased error rates on all APIs in the AP-EAST-1 Region. The issue is resolved and the service is operating normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Update Table Processing Times>
We are investigating increased processing times for update table with Amazon DynamoDB in the US-EAST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Update Table Processing Times>
We are investigating increased processing times for update table with Amazon DynamoDB in the US-EAST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Update Table Processing Times>
We have identified the cause of the increased processing times for update table with Amazon DynamoDB in the US-EAST-1 Region and continue working towards resolution.
